required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Pilot Study Non-Invasive Guidance for Therapeutic Ultrasound Treatment of Lower Back Muscle Injuries
clinical_study.official_title: A Pilot Study to Investigate Non-Invasive Metabolic Guidance for Improving Therapeutic Ultrasound Treatment of Lower Back Muscle Injuries

collaborator.agency: Beckman Laser Institute University of California Irvine

brief_summary.textblock: Back injuries are the most common reason people seeking for effective treatment. One of the most common treatments in sports medicine for muscular injuries is therapeutic ultrasound, which is designed to heat the injured tissue and increase the flow of blood to promote healing.

detailed_description.textblock:
Researchers at Beckman Laser institute, using a technology developed at University of California, Irvine. The device call Diffuse Optical Spectroscopy, this device developed with harmless light that can measures and detect the change of blood flow, oxygen level, temperature and muscle tissue in lower back during therapeutic ultrasound therapy treatment.
The researchers can provide information in real-time tissue change before, during, and after treatments that can determine the effectiveness of the treatment and speed up recovery time.

primary_outcome.description: Diffuse Optical Spectroscopy Imaging measure blood flow,oxygen, temperature in back muscle when they are treated with therapeutic ultrasound and can improve the treatment

arm_group.description: Diffuse Optical Spectroscopy Imaging measure blood flow,oxygen, temperature in back muscle when they are treated with therapeutic ultrasound and can improve the treatment

intervention.description: Diffuse Optical Spectroscopy Imaging measure blood flow,oxygen, temperature in back muscle when they are treated with therapeutic ultrasound and can improve the treatment

study_pop.textblock: Study population will be selected from Univesity of California Irvine Medical Center

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Male or Female over 18 years of age,
- No back injuries, No plan treatment
- Currently diagnose with back injuries, with plan treatment of therapeutic ultrasound
Exclusion Criteria:
- Minors
- Obese
- Pregnant

responsible_party.investigator_full_name: Beckman Laser Institute and Medical Center
responsible_party.investigator_title: Bruce Tromberg,Ph.D.,Director, Beckman Laser Institute and Medical Clinic and Professor, Departments of Biomedical Engineering and Surgery
